Class TeacherViewClassListCenterPanel

java.lang.Object
ticktocktrack.gui.TeacherViewClassListCenterPanel
public class TeacherViewClassListCenterPanel extends Object
A panel that displays the list of classes associated with a teacher. Provides pagination and layout for class cards.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static javafx.scene.layout.Pane
    centerPanel
    The central pane that contains the class list panel.
    private static javafx.scene.layout.VBox

    The VBox container that holds rows of class cards.
    private static final int
    COLUMNS_PER_ROW
    The maximum number of columns per row of class cards.
    private static int
    currentPage
    Tracks the current page being displayed in the paginated list.
    private static final int
    ROWS_PER_PAGE
    The maximum number of rows displayed per page.
    private static int
    teacherId
    The ID of the teacher whose classes are displayed.

      The VBox container that holds rows of class cards.

      Tracks the current page being displayed in the paginated list.

  • Constructor Details

    • TeacherViewClassListCenterPanel

      public TeacherViewClassListCenterPanel()

  • Method Details

    • createPanel

      public static javafx.scene.layout.Pane createPanel(int teacherId)
      Creates the entire panel for viewing a teacher's class list.
      Parameters:
      teacherId - the ID of the teacher whose classes will be displayed.
      Returns:
      a Pane containing the class list interface.

    • addShadowImage

      private static void addShadowImage()
      Adds a shadow image to the center panel. This enhances the visual design of the panel with a shadow effect.

    • addTitle

      private static void addTitle()
      Adds a title to the center panel. The title is styled and positioned to align with the panel's design.

    • addClassListPanel

      private static void addClassListPanel()
      Adds the class list panel to the center panel. Initializes the VBox container for displaying the class list and updates its content based on the teacher's ID.

    • updateClassListPanel

      public static void updateClassListPanel(int teacherId)
      Updates the class list panel with the classes associated with the specified teacher. This method fetches and displays the teacher's classes, formatted into rows and columns for better readability and navigation.
      Parameters:
      teacherId - the ID of the teacher whose class list is to be displayed

    • createCourseBox

      private static javafx.scene.layout.VBox createCourseBox(String courseName, String section, String program)
      Creates a visual representation of a course in the form of a VBox. The box contains details about the course such as its name, section, and program.
      Parameters:
      courseName - the name of the course
      section - the section associated with the course
      program - the program to which the course belongs
      Returns:
      a VBox containing the course's details, styled for display

    • createViewStudentsButton

      private static javafx.scene.control.Button createViewStudentsButton(String courseName, String section, String program, int teacherId)
      Creates a button that allows the teacher to view the list of students enrolled in a specific course. The button triggers the display of detailed student information for the given course, section, and program.
      Parameters:
      courseName - the name of the course
      section - the section associated with the course
      program - the program to which the course belongs
      teacherId - the ID of the teacher viewing the student list
      Returns:
      a Button configured to display the list of students when clicked

    • openStudentList

      private static void openStudentList(String courseName, String section, String program, int teacherId)
      Opens a panel displaying the list of students for a specific course and section. Initializes a new `TeacherViewClassStudents` panel and updates the center panel to show the student list.
      Parameters:
      courseName - the name of the course
      section - the section associated with the course
      program - the program to which the course belongs
      teacherId - the ID of the teacher accessing the student list

    • updateCenterPanel

      public static void updateCenterPanel(javafx.scene.layout.Pane newPanel)
      Updates the main center panel with a new pane, replacing any existing content.
      Parameters:
      newPanel - the new pane to display in the center panel

    • createEditButton

      private static javafx.scene.control.Button createEditButton(String oldCourseName, String oldSection)
      Creates a button to allow editing of the course and section details. The button triggers an interface or dialog for modifying the course name and section.
      Parameters:
      oldCourseName - the current name of the course to be edited
      oldSection - the current section of the course to be edited
      Returns:
      a Button configured to initiate the edit functionality

    • createDeleteButton

      private static javafx.scene.control.Button createDeleteButton(String courseName, String section)
      Creates a delete button for removing a specific course and its associated section. The button triggers a delete action when clicked, calling the `handleDeleteCourse` method in the `ViewClassList` class.
      Parameters:
      courseName - the name of the course to be deleted
      section - the section of the course to be deleted
      Returns:
      a Button styled and configured to delete the specified course

    • createNavButtons

      private static javafx.scene.layout.HBox createNavButtons(int totalCourses)
      Creates navigation buttons for paginating through the class list. The buttons allow the user to navigate between pages of courses based on the total number of courses.
      Parameters:
      totalCourses - the total number of courses available
      Returns:
      an HBox containing the navigation buttons

    • incrementPage

      public static void incrementPage()
      Increments the current page number and updates the class list panel. This method is used to navigate to the next page of courses.

    • decrementPage

      public static void decrementPage()
      Decrements the current page number and updates the class list panel. This method is used to navigate to the previous page of courses.
